item.description:
Hopefully the January weather will behave for a weeknight Meetup at Damata's, where the food is great, as are the prices. Their menu not only includes pizza but sandwiches, pasta, and salad as well. If you have not attended a Meetup at Damata's before, generally everyone orders at 6:30, and we socialize and eat until starting games shortly after 7:00.

(We do request at Meetups held at service venues that each person attending at least order one item: food or beverage.)

There is also plenty of free parking. Should you be coming from outside of Salem, just remember that Damata's is on Bridge St., not the Bridge St. Bypass.

Please bring your favorite board game to play.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Game night at Damata's
